body: Where the fuck is the rape tag? 😐 just no, the fact that they forced him to enjoy it too. Why did the author write it and think "oh its not rape"
why is there no rape tag?

How can someone write this about Karamatsu and not feel bad. Like why can't Karamatsu have one good thing. Let him graduate. Why call him a slut!? God u feel Soo bad. He just wants to embrace them and the only way he'll ever get love is by him being the one fucked by his burazas.
